# UICloudSharingControllerDelegate

**Protocol**

The protocol you implement to provide additional information to, and receive notifications from, the CloudKit sharing controller.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor protocol UICloudSharingControllerDelegate : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Overview

Implement an object that conforms to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICloudSharingControllerDelegate] protocol when you want to:

- Configure a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICloudSharingController] instance.
- Receive notifications from a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICloudSharingController] instance as it attempts to save or remove the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CloudKit/CKShare] record based on user interactions on the Invitation and People screens.

## Configuring the view controller

- **itemTitle(for:)**: Asks the delegate for the title to display on the invitation screen.
- **itemType(for:)**: Asks the delegate for the Uniform Type Identifier (UTI) of the item.
- **itemThumbnailData(for:)**: Asks the delegate for the thumbnail image data to display on the invitation.

## Processing shared items

- **cloudSharingController(_:failedToSaveShareWithError:)**: Tells the delegate that the CloudKit sharing controller failed to save the share record.
- **cloudSharingControllerDidStopSharing(_:)**: Tells the delegate that the user has stopped sharing the record.
- **cloudSharingControllerDidSaveShare(_:)**: Tells the delegate that the CloudKit sharing controller saved the share record.

## Customizing the cloud sharing controller behavior

- **delegate**: A reference to an object that conforms to the CloudKit sharing controller delegate protocol.
